description: This file demonstrates the usage of the FireworksEmbedder to generate embeddings for a text string and initializes an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database connection, embedding details, and document count.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base agent that interacts with a vector database.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for interacting with a PostgreSQL vector database.

classes.name: FireworksEmbedder
classes.description: A class responsible for generating embeddings using the Fireworks method.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embedding vectors for a given input text.
